xxl.core.math.functions
Class AdaptiveWeightFunctions.ProgressiveDegressiveWeights

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.math.functions.AdaptiveWeightFunctions.ProgressiveDegressiveWeights
All Implemented Interfaces:
RealFunction
Enclosing class:
AdaptiveWeightFunctions
public static class AdaptiveWeightFunctions.ProgressiveDegressiveWeights
extends Object
implements RealFunction

This class provides a progressive respectively degressive weighting with a parameter alpha. For alpha in (0,1) the weighting is progressive and for alpha > 1 degressive.

          Parameter for the weighting: alpha.
